review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2022
name: Ashley Catapano
title: Fun
text: I had never seen these before, until our local library had them. I was instantly hooked!!!! I got one for each of my kids and some for gifts as well. They are so fun and engaging, and will also be great as a car toy so kids don't have to be on screens for travel. Highly recommend for any age!

title: Great road trip fun!
